General.Name: Gold Terra Resource Corp
General.Description: Gold Terra Resource Corp. explores and develops mineral properties in Canada. It holds 100% interests in the Yellowknife City gold project that includes Northbelt, Southbelt, Eastbelt, and Quyta-Bell properties in the Northwest Territories, as well as other claims and property interests encompassing 800 square kilometers of land located in the Northwest Territories. The company also holds 100% interests in Mulligan property located in New Brunswick. In addition, it holds interests in the Aurora 1 and 2 claims located in Yellowknife. The company was formerly known as TerraX Minerals Inc. and changed its name to Gold Terra Resource Corp. in February 2020. Gold Terra Resource Corp. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 325 Howe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1Z7
